description: Adds or updates a tag on a given resource.

parameters.name: resourceArn
parameters.description: The ARN of a resource that can be tagged.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: The key-value map of strings. The valid character set is [a-zA-Z+-=._:/]. The tag key can be up to 128 characters and must not start with aws:. The tag value can be up to 256 characters. (string) --- (string) ---
